about_the_game:
• Distinct art-style that brings the haunting world of Hollow Veil to life.
  • Immersive narrative-driven gameplay unfolds a grim tale of mystery, ancient gods, and supernatural peril.
  • Fast-paced turn-based combat challenges players to destroy their foes in whatever manner they see fit.
  • Unravel what secrets lie in the land of Hollow Veil as you explore its haunted landscapes and encounter its gently-deranged inhabitants.


Welcome to the mysterious land of Hollow Veil, where darkness thrives and hopeless souls wander endlessly. In "The Watcher's Curse," you step into the shoes of Artem, a duty-burdened watcher tasked with protecting the world from chaos spawn.

As a watcher, Artem's responsibilities are twofold: learn the secrets of the world along with any lost knowledge and remove any spawns of chaos. Whether stationed in an overlapped hell forest or chasing ancient horrors through an ageless monolith, Artem faces a relentless barrage of esoteric threats.

Our tale begins with Artem in a precarious predicament, unexpectedly transported across the world after a chance encounter with a seemingly innocuous tome. Stranded in the gloomy confines of Grimm's Briar, nestled amidst the foreboding Noctemura mountains, Artem crosses paths with Mayor Barkeep. Eager to return home, Artem finds himself entangled in the mayor's plea for aid in unraveling the enigma shrouding the disappearance of local villagers.

Embark on a perilous journey through haunted graveyards, pestilent sewers, and eerie forests as Artem dives deeper into the heart of the mystery. Along the way, he encounters a motley cast of characters, from a god of rot masquerading as a raccoon to a morbidly obsessed innkeeper, each offering their own unique brand of assistance in his quest to avert impending catastrophe.

Will you uncover the truth behind the land of Hollow Veil, or will the ever encroaching doom prove to be too much for even Artem's calloused hands?

name: The Watcher's Curse Demo
short_description: Search for ancient knowledge, face off against the supernatural, and solve the mysteries plaguing the land of Hollow Veil. The forces of chaos are rising and you may be the only living being that can stop them. Traverse the world, level up, and face down esoteric horrors.
